mutants.original_line: return ''.join([char.upper() if char.islower() else char.lower() for char in text])
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join([char.upper() if char.islower() else char.lower() for char in text])
mutants.code:
def change_capitalization(text):
    return 'MUTATED'.join([char.upper() if char.islower() else char.lower() for char in text])
